title.native: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description:
Hiiragi Utena is a major fangirl of the magical girls protecting her city, so when she has the chance to become one herself, she leaps at the chance to join their technicolor ranks… but when she transforms, she learns she isn’t fated to be a daring do-gooder, but rather a villain on the side of evil! At first she tries to quit her new gig as the leader of the local baddies, but she quickly realizes she enjoys it and is a total natural at tormenting the magical girls she loves so much. With both a bang and a whimper, Hiragi’s journey as a magical-girl-tormenting sadist has begun!

(Source: HIDIVE)

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Sadism
tags.description: Prominently features characters deriving pleasure, especially sexual gratification, from inflicting pain, suffering, or humiliation on others.

tags.name: Yuri

tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Exhibitionism

tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Guns

title.native: 魔法少女にあこがれて

node.description: Akinari Suzuki is a composer and arranger.

A Japanese voice actress unit formed of [Natsumi Murakami](https://anilist.co/staff/121712/Natsumi-Murakami) and [Chiemi Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/120102/Chiemi-Tanaka).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/NACHERRY_STAFF) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nacherry_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCidjZB0LX5l8aKzjLN0-1ZQ)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/824_aoi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/koga_aoi0824/) | [Agency Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=199) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/古賀葵)

Aoi Koga is a Japanese voice actress affiliated with 81 Produce.

Koga had an interest in anime since her childhood, watching series such as Cardcaptor Sakura and Ojamajo Doremi. She first became interested in voice acting after watching the television program Okaasan to Issho and becoming fond of the puppet segments featured in the show. This made her want to "become friends with dolls" and, along with her interest in anime, helped her decide to pursue a career in entertainment. In pursuit of becoming a voice actress, Koga would take acting lessons at a vocational school in Fukuoka. Following this, she enrolled in the training school of the agency 81 Produce, becoming affiliated with them upon her finishing her training.

__Awards:__
• Best Lead Actress at the 14th Seiyuu Awards in 2020 for her role as [Kaguya Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/120649/).

Non-Anime Roles:
~!
• [Paimon](https://anilist.co/character/203317/Paimon) - Genshin Impact (VG)
• [Kriemhild](https://anilist.co/character/343255/Kriemhild) - Fate/Grand Order (VG)
• [Rozaliya Olenyeva](https://anilist.co/character/207926/Rozaliya-Olenyeva) - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
• Ivy - Memento Mori (VG)
• [Kunimi Tama](https://anilist.co/character/321902/Tama-Kunimi) - Heaven Burns Red (VG)!~

[Profile](https://www.amuse.co.jp/artist/A8990/index.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/izm_tako)

Fuuka Izumi is a voice actress affiliated with Amuse from Aichi Prefecture, Japan. She was previously affiliated with VIMS, and is a graduate of Nihon Narration Engi Kenkyuujo.
